alert.note: Alert for McLean; Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 3:26AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Logan, southeastern Tazewell and southwestern McLean Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 326 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near South Pekin to near Stanford. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Danvers and Stanford around 330 AM CDT. Tremont and Delavan around 345 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hopedale, Minier and Armington. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 11 and 26. Interstate 55 between mile markers 145 and 151. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for central Illinois.
